It isn’t unusual here to see a mortgage payment of $2,000 a month where $800, or even $1,000, of that monthly payment is property taxes. My plan is to retire in 7 years and move to another state that has low housing costs and low cost of living while living off two pensions and VA disability. If I can lower my current mortgage payment by 25% or more by refinancing to  50 year mortgage, that’s more cash in my pocket later when I sell this house to buy in another state.
